iguanatweaksexpanded.apply_to_enchanting: This book can be applied to enchanting tables to let them learn the enchantments
iguanatweaksexpanded.enchanting_table.al: The enchanting table already knows this enchantment: %s up to level %s
iguanatweaksexpanded.enchanting_table.le: The enchanting table has learned %s up to level %s
iguanatweaksexpanded.enchanting_table.up: The enchanting table has upgraded the max level of %s from %s to %s
iguanatweaksexpanded.enchanting_table.no: This enchanted book has no valid enchantments on it
death.attack.experience_curse: %s was killed by it's own equipment
death.attack.experience_curse.player: %s was killed by it's own equipment
death.attack.blood_pact: %s was consumed by the Blood Pact
death.attack.blood_pact.player: %s was consumed by the Blood Pact
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.vindica: Stack damage when attacked and deal it back with the next strike
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.recover: Recover some health back overtime when attacked
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.exchang: Replaces blocks broken with the ones in the off-hand
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.blastin: Increases mining speed on blocks with low blast resistance
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.air_bor: Ignores the mining speed penalty when not on ground
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.adrenal: Tool mines and attacks faster the lower the durability
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.knowled: Chance for mobs hit or blocks mined to drop xp
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.soulbou: The item stays in your inventory after perishing
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.sprint_: Greatly increased movement speed, but can no longer sprint
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.steady_: Negates fall damage but twice is applied to boots
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.water_c: Increases damage against fire resistant and water sensitive creatures
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.rage.in: Deal more damage the less health you have
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.smartne: Increased experience from mobs, blocks and fishing
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.part_br: Gives a chance for mobs to drop extra items
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.lucky_h: Has a chance to fish two items
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.tear_cu: Picking up experience damages the item
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.ender_c: Randomly teleports the wearer when hurt
enchantment.iguanatweaksexpanded.blood_p: Using the item can hurt the user
iguanatweaksexpanded.invalid_fletching_t: This block is not valid. Break and place it back.
iguanatweaksexpanded.crate_weighted: Slows down if %d or more are carried
effect.iguanatweaksexpanded.energy_boost: Decreases tiredness by 0.2 each second per level.
iguanatweaksexpanded:innate_keego_moveme: You move faster the more you walk
iguanatweaksexpanded:innate_keego_attack: You attack faster the more you walk
iguanatweaksexpanded:innate_keego_mine: You mine faster the more you walk
iguanatweaksexpanded.cant_forge: Can't forge, no recipe found or output slot occupied
iguanatweaksexpanded.multi_block_structu: Requires a multi block structure to work
iguanatweaksexpanded.blast_furnace_inval: Multi block structure not valid. Top layer can be brick stairs.
iguanatweaksexpanded.soul_blast_furnace_: Multi block structure not valid. Top layer can be red nether brick stairs.
iguanatweaksexpanded.invalid_blast_furna: This block is not valid. Break and place it back.
item.iguanatweaksexpanded.smithing_templ: Add diamond armor, weapon, or tool
iguanatweaksexpanded.requires_catalyst: Can't activate. The Obelisk requires at least one catalyst block
iguanatweaksexpanded.obelisk_disabled: Respawn Obelisk disabled. Your respawn point has been set to your last bed, or reset if you didn't have one
iguanatweaksexpanded.fail_respawn_obelis: You couldn't respawn at the obelisk because it was disabled.
iguanatweaksexpanded.set_old_respawn: Your old respawn point has been set.
advancements.sr_story.root.title: Iguana Tweaks
advancements.sr_story.root.description: Bringing back Survival in Minecraft since 2023
advancements.sr_story.wooden_pickaxe.des: Obtain your first Wooden Tool. Lasts a lot under the sunlight.
advancements.sr_story.early_shield.title: Better than taking a full blow
advancements.sr_story.early_shield.descr: Obtain a Shield to block some damage.
advancements.sr_story.flint_pickaxe.desc: Obtain your first Flint Tool. Flint can be crafted from Gravel or obtained by ground Flint rocks. Flint tools are slow to attack but can mine quite fast.
advancements.sr_story.battle_pickaxes.de: Hit a mob with a Pickaxe, and realize that any tool can be used as weapon. Pickaxes deal damage that ignores armor. Shovels have bonus knockback and hoes attack really fast.
advancements.sr_story.charcoal.title: Improvise and Ignite
advancements.sr_story.charcoal.descripti: Coal can only be obtained with an Iron pickaxe or higher. Obtain Charcoal by burning logs. A flint in both hands seems to do the job.
advancements.sr_story.campfire.title: Early Game Furnace
advancements.sr_story.furnace.title: A primitive smelter
advancements.sr_story.furnace.descriptio: Obtain a Furnace, the campfire might help smelting the Copper
advancements.sr_story.copper_tools.title: Deeper, Faster, Stronger
advancements.sr_story.copper_tools.descr: Craft a copper tool, which mines faster the deeper you are in the world.
advancements.sr_story.torch.title: Shed some light
advancements.sr_story.torch.description: Obtain a torch, the campfire and some sticks might come in handy
advancements.sr_story.blast_furnace.desc: Obtain a Blast Furnace, then build a 3x3x3 structure to use it. Right click on it to see a ghost of the structure. Can smelt, alloy and recycle.
advancements.sr_story.forge.title: Metal equipment anyone?
advancements.sr_story.iron_pickaxe.title: Getting an upgrade
advancements.sr_story.iron_pickaxe.descr: Upgrade a Stone Pickaxe in a Forge
advancements.sr_story.golden_pickaxe.des: Obtain a Gold Pickaxe by upgrading a Flint Pickaxe. You'll feel luck run through your veins.
advancements.sr_story.iron_shield.title: The vanilla shield
advancements.sr_story.iron_shield.descri: Upgrade a Stone shield to an Iron one in a Forge
advancements.sr_story.iron_nugget.title: Small traces in stone
advancements.sr_story.iron_nugget.descri: Obtain an Iron Nugget by mining Stone
advancements.sr_story.chained_copper_arm: Obtain a piece of Chained Copper Armor
advancements.sr_story.durium_ingot.title: Alloying
advancements.sr_story.durium_ingot.descr: Obtain a Durium Ingot by alloying Durium Scrap Block, Clay and Sand in a Blast Furnace. Durium can be found in rivers.
advancements.sr_story.quaron.title: Wrong tools only
advancements.sr_story.quaron.description: Obtain a Quaron Ingot by alloying Raw Iron, 2 Amethyst Clusters and a Blaze Rod. The tools made from this metal can mine blocks that don't require a tool faster.
advancements.sr_story.quaron_fishing_rod: Obtain a Quaron Fishing Rod. It always consumes 1 durability when used but it's slower to lure fishes.
advancements.sr_story.durium_gear.title: Stiffer than iron
advancements.sr_story.durium_gear.descri: Obtain any Durium Gear by upgrading a Iron gear in the Smithing Table
advancements.sr_story.seeds.title: Seedy Business
advancements.sr_story.cleansed_lapis.des: Use a Cleansed Lapis to infuse an item and enchant it to it's maximum power
Use an enchanted book on an enchanting table to make the enchantment(s) available in the table
advancements.sr_story.enchanted_cleansed: Empower an item with an Enchanted Cleansed Lapis (made in an anvil with Experience Bottle) to get even better enchanting power and over max level enchantments
advancements.sr_story.activate_respawn_o: Activate a Respawn Obelisk with right-click by placing at least a precious block at the same height and set the respawn point. Respawning here will give some buffs, other than a precise respawn.
advancements.sr_story.crate.title: This is heavy
advancements.sr_story.crate.description: Get a movement speed penalty by transporting more than one Portable Crate.
advancements.sr_story.bucket.title: How is water infinite?
advancements.sr_story.bucket.description: Obtain an Iron Bucket in a Forge.
advancements.sr_story.biome_compass.desc: Since some ores now generate more in different biomes, the Biome Compass will help you understanding which biome you're in.
advancements.sr_story.ores.coal.title: From plants to fuel
advancements.sr_story.ores.coal.descript: Great amounts of Coal can be found in Desert
advancements.sr_story.ores.iron.title: Forged in Fire
advancements.sr_story.ores.iron.descript: Great amounts of Iron can be found in Taigas and Lush Caves
advancements.sr_story.ores.gold.title: Molten Treasure
advancements.sr_story.ores.gold.descript: Great amounts of Iron can be found in Badlands
advancements.sr_story.ores.diamond.title: Crystals Under Pressure
advancements.sr_story.ores.diamond.descr: Great amounts of Diamonds can be found in Jungles
advancements.sr_story.ores.emerald.title: Gems of Tectonic Uplift
advancements.sr_story.ores.emerald.descr: Great amounts of Emeralds can be found in Mountains
advancements.sr_story.ores.lapis.title: Metamorphic Blue
advancements.sr_story.ores.lapis.descrip: Great amounts of Lapislazuli can be found in non-snowy Plains
advancements.sr_story.ores.redstone.desc: Great amounts of Redstone can be found in Oceans
advancements.sr_story.ores.copper.title: Born from Oxidation
advancements.sr_story.ores.copper.descri: Great amounts of Copper can be found in Savanas
advancements.sr_story.ore_rocks.title: Ore Rocks
advancements.sr_story.ore_rocks.descript: Pick up an Ore rock. These are generated where lots of ores lie underground.
advancements.sr_story.shears.title: Scissors?
advancements.sr_story.iron_armor.title: Suit Up
advancements.sr_story.iron_armor.descrip: Create Iron Armor by upgrading a Chained Copper one in a Forge.
advancements.sr_story.explosive_barrel.d: Craft an Explosive Barrel. Warning: explodes easily.
advancements.sr_story.altimeter.title: Ups and downs
advancements.sr_story.altimeter.descript: Craft an Altimeter to roughly know your height. Each layer on the Altimeter represents 16 blocks from Bedrock.
advancements.sr_story.diamond_armor.desc: Equip a full set of diamond armor by upgrading Gold armor in a Forge.
advancements.sr_story.firestarter.title: Starting Fires
advancements.sr_story.firestarter.descri: Craft a Firestarter to create fire more consistently.
advancements.sr_story.rich_farmland.desc: Use Bone Meal on Farmland (or on crops while crouching) to create Rich Farmland. Rich farmland makes crops grow faster, but decays after a while.
advancements.sr_story.smoker.title: Smoking hot
advancements.sr_story.smoker.description: Since furnaces are too hot to cook food, a Smoker should do it.
advancements.sr_story.winter_is_coming.d: It's autumn! Make sure to stack up food and wood before Winter as almost nothing grows and animals don't spawn. Also a calendar can help keep track of the season.
advancements.sr_story.fletching_table.ti: Â§oI shoot my arrows in the air sometimes
advancements.sr_story.fletching_table.de: Make a Fletching table to be able to make more arrows
advancements.sr_story.diamond_arrow.desc: Make Diamond arrows that deal much more damage than base arrows
advancements.sr_story.quartz_arrow.title: White tip
advancements.sr_story.quartz_arrow.descr: Make Quartz arrows that deal piercing damage (ignore armor)
advancements.sr_story.torch_arrow.title: Big caves require torching
advancements.sr_story.cloth.title: Give me your dress
advancements.sr_story.bundle.title: That one item
advancements.sr_story.chainmail.title: Forged from fire
advancements.sr_story.chainmail.descript: Obtain a Chainmail piece of armor
advancements.sr_story.solarium.title: Praise the sun
advancements.sr_story.solarium.descripti: Obtain a Solarium Equipment by Smithing Iron with a Solarium Ball
advancements.sr_story.toolbelt.title: Steve the builder
advancements.sr_story.toolbelt.descripti: Obtain a tool belt. Place items in it by right click, equip it with 'V' and open the wheel with 'R' (Keybinds may vary)
advancements.sr_story.toolbelt_upgrade.d: Obtain a belt pouch and use an anvil to upgrade the Tool Belt
advancements.sr_story.sawmill.title: Stonecutter but for wood
advancements.sr_story.hard_mode.title: Hard Mode
advancements.sr_story.hard_mode.descript: You've unlocked Hard Mode. Mobs will drop more stuff but have buffed stats.
advancements.sr_story.unfair_oneshot.des: If you get hit for enough damage that would kill you when your health is above 7.5 hearts, that's an unfair one-shot and you're left with half a heart
advancements.sr_story.anvil_fix.title: Fix the fixer
advancements.sr_story.anvil_fix.descript: Repair an anvil with Iron Blocks.
advancements.sr_story.coated_copper_tool: Obtain a Coated Copper tool and electrocute your enemies.
advancements.sr_nether.soul_blast_furnac: Powered by mobs you killed ... probably
Obtain a Soul Blast Furnace, then build a 3x3x3 structure to use it. Right click on it to see a ghost of the structure.
advancements.sr_nether.keego.title: Stuck in Bedrock
advancements.sr_nether.keego.description: Maybe a blast can pop it out of there
advancements.sr_nether.recall_potion.des: Obtain a Recall Potion by mixin a Wither Rose and an Echo Shard into a Regenration II Potion
emi.info.iguanatweaksexpanded.grindstone: Can be used to disenchant items and get back a percentage of experience or can be used to extract curses and treasure enchantments from items with a book. Can also be used to "reset" a lodestone compass
Can be used to extract curses and treasure enchantments from items with a book. Can also be used to "reset" a lodestone compass
emi.info.iguanatweaksexpanded.cleansed_l: Apply to an item to unlock it's full enchantability
emi.info.iguanatweaksexpanded.enchanted_: Apply to an item to increase enchantability and be able to go over max enchantments level
emi.info.grindstone: Can be used to disenchant items
emi.info.iguanatweaksexpanded.altimeter: Roughly shows your height with a precision of 16 blocks
emi.info.charcoal: Can be obtained by burning logs
emi.info.iguanatweaksexpanded.golden_pow: Fastest speed powered rail, should not be used for slopes due to Minecarts being wonky
emi.info.iguanatweaksexpanded.keego_mini: Keego Tools are based off momentum. Each block broken increases mining speed
emi.info.iguanatweaksexpanded.keego_atta: Keego Weapons are based off momentum. Each attack increases attack speed
emi.info.iguanatweaksexpanded.keego_movi: Keego Armor is based off momentum. Each blocks moved increases movement speed
emi.info.iguanatweaksexpanded.repair_kit: Can be used in a crafting grid to repair items, like when repairing with Anvils
